About the Client

Blood Givers Laguna is a local association that helps connect blood givers with recipient, in order to save lives. On the last years, it has saved thousands of lives and it's a never stop organization.

The Challenge

Develop a web platform that helps blood searchers find a blood giver in case of emergency in an easy and fast way in order to save lifes. This is a huge impact inside the community because there is no similar system and everything is needs to be post by social media or calls to several hospitals. Let's save lifes! ❤❤

Solution

Create a platform where the blood searcher can register and ask for the type of blood is needed. On the other side, if the user is a blood giver it's important to register and fill out all the fields to be approved as candidate as blood giver. The blood searcher will have access to a list of possible people that can donate so they can chose a candidate. The candidate will receive an instant notification so he can attend to the hospital where the blood is needed. As an extra: A landing page was created with information about the importance of blood donation, the steps that need to be follow to become a candidate, information about the association and testimonials of successful cases.

Technologies

  • HTML, CSS3
  • Less, SASS
  • Javascript
  • JSP (Java Server Pages)
  • Ajax
  • Marvel App(Mockups)

Torreón, México
